channel.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
channel.description:
Hey guys i found this site: http://www.softsyshosting.com/windows-vps.aspx
They are selling a 1gb windows vps for $14.95.I was wondering if anyone has used this vps or can check it out and let me know if it will work good for me if i were to run a runescape private server on it.
Also for windows vps would i just upload all my server files to the interenet go into vps and download them back from the internet and pre much go on no-ip.biz make a server ip and be done? or do i need to portforward that some how aswell?
Hope you guys can answer this.

item.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.source: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?

item.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:528769”]http://www.pavhost.com/vps.html

For a windows VPS, yes, You’d just upload your SERVER (source) to the Internet (Dropbox is good for uploading stuff like this), and download them back on your VPS. Most VPS’ are auto-portforwarded, so you don’t need to portforward. You CAN run the server on a No-ip. Most people do.
PM me for more help.
Good luck![/quote]

You know the service is bad when they mistakenly have Gb and GB used in their package tiers.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?

ok thanks guys ill problly end up getting 1gb from here http://www.softsyshosting.com/windows-vps.aspx

item.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Yeah pavhost are pretty bad. Their servers are slow and overcrowded, and the support staff never seemed to understand me whenever I asked any questions or had issues.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?

item.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Pavhost is the most shittest place to go for vps. You know it’s unprofessional when Lil_Smok3r just said he worked for customer service (he’s only 13?!!).

If you want something good go to something more professional and legit. I wouldn’t get shared hosting either because it’ll just cause you problems in the end tbh.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?

item.title: Should I buy this vps?trusted site?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I’ve used PavHost before. I know the owner of it too. It’s efficient, Customer service is excellent (I’ve worked for Customer Service’s Help Team hehe). So yeah. I can also personally help you once you buy a VPS. Since I’m staff there
